pages.text: Asphalt is a mixed material to build roads with (a concrete, really). It improves wheel rotation, braking, speeding up, friction changes, and more.
Asphalt comes in 4 ages. New, Ok, Mediocre, and Old. Old is the slowest, and New is the fastest. Put on soul speed boots to go even faster.
Asphalt can also be turned into layered asphalt, which can transition from one layer of asphalt to a higher or lower asphalt block layer. Road grades have never been easier to make.
Combined with sidewalks, roadways can look fairly decent, but not too realistic.
